info.summary:
Hui Xiong works as a Professor、ACM Distinguished Scientist、IEEE Fellow in Management Science and Information Systems Department Rutgers, the State University of New Jersey, and his\her h-index is 63, g-index is 111. His\Her interests are :
 Data Mining; Recommender Systems; Clustering Algorithm...; Hyperclique Pattern; K Means;
